mission.title: Is GDP Becoming Obsolete? The “Beyond GDP” Debate
mission.driving_question: Is GDP a persuasive indicator of individual well-being or economic progress? Should we replace GDP with a metric that better reflects the welfare dimension?
tasks: Propose a new metric that could replace or complement GDP
Discuss the implications of this new metric
pre_thinking_prompts: What is GDP and why is it important?
What are some criticisms of GDP as a measure of economic health?
What other metrics could be used to measure economic progress and individual well-being?
mission.reflection_prompt: Reflect on the limitations of GDP and the potential benefits and drawbacks of your proposed metric.
ai_tutor_prompts: Explain the concept of GDP in your own words.
What are some potential issues with using GDP as the sole measure of economic health?
Describe your proposed metric and how it addresses the limitations of GDP.
mission.remix_zone: Consider how this discussion might change if we were considering a different country or economic system.
